tweets.text: @PHE_EoEngland @DOHgovph more evidence of health harms in Newcastle under Lyme after direct exposure to landfill gas. Disgraceful @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/gCfRszBdNL

Sampling down river in Upper Wharfedale yesterday looking for E. coli pollution hotspots while flow is low. See colour change! But not pollution - peaty water from Grimwith Res? @YorkDalesRT @CleanIlkley @EnvAgencyYNE @YorkshireWater @yorkshire_dales https://t.co/21ooqlAlaA

@SianieRoo @Cap_it_off @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA @PHE_EoEngland i went on my bike last night. it was lovely riding around audley/scott hay. but as soon as i came back down the a34 towards newcastle i was hit with a wall of stench. i was wheezy all night after. like exercise induced asthma (which Ive never experienced before)

We're turning back the clock to make the river Tamar more resilient to climate change. 

Creating a wildlife-rich wetland that will support rare birds and lock up carbon, the project will be supported by @EnvAgency, @NaturalEngland and @PlymUni. https://t.co/sTY835FFUD

Each UK farm can expect only 1 @EnvAgency inspection every 263 years: Devastating report out today by @SalmonTroutCons on the collapse and defunding of agri pollution enforcement in the UK https://t.co/R3l3xsAV8B

More than a million people in India die every year due to pollution only & 10 of the world’s 15 most polluted cities are in India. but we never worried as the death is accounted for some other cause. https://t.co/dn0Or8rfje but #COVID19 is different, every death is COVID death.

@Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink 
Hope you’re listening @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA @MattHancock https://t.co/2UE28hIYiA

tweets.text:
#surveying at Allington Lock in Kent, collecting #bathymetricdata for @JBAConsulting and @EnvAgency

#topographicsurvey #bathymetry #trimble #korecphotocomp https://t.co/qvszebNjHN

Newcastle under Lyme this morning trying to find a survive the landfill fumes. Westlands honks again, air purifier on over drive & can still smell it, need inhaler. Come on now @JamesBevanEA Close it & prosecute ASAP @PHE_EoEngland   @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/jNGFhLYlly

Would you know what to do in a flood? Well the next team in #50teams50days certainly do. Our flood resilience teams lead the local development of flood warnings and give invaluable advice to communities and partners on how to prepare for the worse 🙏🏻  https://t.co/Kze58IHzY1 https://t.co/GO55ACf5cH

This is about a lot more than the smell of a landfill. Emissions of hydrogen sulphide are way in excess of WHO guidelines. The @EnvAgency has been slow to act but is now starting to get somewhere. The firm has in the past resorted to threatening local people and the local MP.
@tayz_BETH @StinkStopthe @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA For anyone not on Facebook https://t.co/MC81zoShPF

tweets.text:
Chatted to many #StopTheStink protestors today outside Red Industries HQ.

🔴 Some wanting apologies
🔴 Some saying going to work is respite
🔴 All saying Walleys Quarry is damaging mental and physical health
🔴 All wanting firm and fast action from the @EnvAgency and @PHE_uk https://t.co/My2poRAf2T

Team 11 in #50teams50days is our wonderful plastics team in the equally wonderful Devon & Cornwall - check out all they do on preventing plastics pollution in that lovely part of the world - I joined them for a virtual beach visit early doors this morning! https://t.co/TSzmq5m5FV https://t.co/7O2GDpf1LN
@cpvolgroup @savebutterflies @Lancswildlife @WoodlandTrust @yoe2019lcr @MerseyRivers @EnvAgencyNW @merseyforest The underwing is beautiful!

Tick Tock @RedIndustries2 Looking forward to fresh air in 3 days. In the meantime we breathe in the flames from your hell pit landfill. We cant breathe! @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA @PHE_EoEngland @Cap_it_off #stopthestink https://t.co/Gtn257ZCdq

Speckled Wood #butterfly along Croxteth Brook this morning @savebutterflies @NMBiodiversity @Lancswildlife @WoodlandTrust @yoe2019lcr @MerseyRivers @EnvAgencyNW #CitizenScience #nature #wildlife @merseyforest #WorldParksWeek #iNaturalist #parage  #aegeria #phonephotography https://t.co/lKOFJWkxeg

tweets.text: @NTSouthWest @EnvAgencySW That's really exciting. We've just enjoyed exploring the salt marshes at Porlock. Absolutely fascinating, and so beautiful. https://t.co/FCECwd4FF1
Just so they see it @EnvAgencyYNE @NorthumbrianH2O 😭😭😭 please retweet #northumberland https://t.co/CaKlotJBBX

Today we published “Doing its job?”, a report on the @EnvAgency and its role protecting English rivers, lakes and streams. The report shows Agency failing to protect rivers, with its hands tied by central Gov. The time to reverse river damage is now https://t.co/y71Uhx7jzp

@EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA  @JamesBevanEA  @AaronBell4NUL  Can anybody justify why Clayton Hall landfill site was closed down with these numbers of complaints, when #WalleysQuarry received 10430 in a recent 6 week period? Plenty more facts where these came from...
#StopTheStink https://t.co/Z0G6tFVYc4

Concerned about #microplastics - take a look at this from our #PreventingPlasticPollution colleagues at the @EnvAgency 
#freshwater #BringingRiversToLife https://t.co/wTzIhDv9vr

Many thanks to the 46 practitioners who attended the Little Whirlpool Ramshorn snail workshop yesterday. Good discussions on how to conserve this very threatened species in its key areas: the Broads, Pevensey Levels and Arun Valley. @NaturalEngland @EnvAgency @sdnpa @BroadsAuth https://t.co/8oFe1Qo23j

@beanz2809 @EnvAgencyYNE @NorthumbrianH2O https://t.co/zAabqqVjlC

I signed this a week ago Jilly x
Working with the @EnvAgency we help to mitigate flood risk. Find out how here https://t.co/PboLfsxLw3 #Flooding #ClimateChange #Flooding #ClimateChange #EnvironmentAgency https://t.co/zJds7532ez

@EnvAgencyYNE absolutely disgusted that once again, #HortonBurn is polluted. This burn has kingfishers, dippers, ducks and other wildlife. Action needs to be taken NOW!! I’m so upset to see this!! #disgraceful #action @NorthumbrianH2O https://t.co/doZqHRaHD3

We all need a day off from both inhaling the fumes and fighting it. It’s hard work mentally and physically. It can’t carry on. The authorities MUST kick those monsters out of our town @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland @Cap_it_off #stopthestink @ClareDinnisEA https://t.co/81sj3I9Pne
Loud and clear @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @PHE_EoEngland STOP THE STINK! @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/VubwPU7lnC
Brilliant turn out @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/YDexaLpJWp
Cowardice @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @PHE_EoEngland #stopthestink @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe https://t.co/jIsTlZI8vJ

Time for @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland to show that people are more important than politics. Good must conquer evil @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/nsWhSXGxny

Well done to everyone who played a part and everyone who turned up on the day. Absolutely brilliant @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/PnSmMnRv4E

We will not stop until @RedIndustries2 are removed from the landfill @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA Time for change. Ditch RED and turn Newcastle GREEN again! @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/czbjC0BjoZ

Come on @JamesBevanEA We need to see a stop to the harmful landfill gases & we also need to see some accountability from both @RedIndustries2 & the @EnvAgency Cap it & close it. @Cap_it_off Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/PRFsurH4f4

@Sutcliffe_Park @Thames21 @qwag @_Kidbrooke So much better than those boring underused football pitches that used 2B. @LewishamCouncil benefits from much lowered flood risk. Thnx @EnvAgencySE . Ironic that (still lacking a Nature Conservation Officer) @Royal_Greenwich objected to it but welcomed resulting awards! Shame... https://t.co/KPE1Sz0I8V

Still no contact @EnvAgency 

Wildlife in danger! 1000's of fish & eels died in last time

THIS IS INDUSTRIAL SCALE DUMPING INTO HORTON BURN 

@AustenShakespe1 @newspostleader @ChronicleLive @TheJournalNews @HannahGraham21 @RSPCA_official @N_landCouncil @itvtynetees @ChrisConway https://t.co/7xj2PiY65p https://t.co/WmhoyLWR1G

The Westlands absolutely reeked this morning again despite the air purifier going at full capacity. Outside the house was like Satan @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @PHE_EoEngland @Cap_it_off #stopthestink https://t.co/9q1Dc4IUJN
It’s not a difficult message @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA Four days & you need to close them down @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/cp9sMUuCEV
@KeepourS @CanalRiverTrust @EnvAgency Hi, thank you for letting us know. This area has been tested and we're continuing to review this. Thank you.

Brilliant peaceful well organised well behaved community protest.We should NEVER have been forced onto the street to beg for fresh air in the 1st place but we can hold our heads high for the dignified manner we did it with. Close them down @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland #stopthestink https://t.co/s7fMfwzcoF
..or a @CanalRiverTrust or @EnvAgency  the Iron Oxide will possibly kill everything off. Please can someone point right area of contact? Thanks

tweets.text: Reported hydrogen sulphide on ward 205 at Royal Stoke hospital. Woke me up, which is wonderful when in slow labour 🙌🏻   @UHNM_NHS @PHE_uk @PHE_WestMids @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency
